attributes.title: Episode 1: Spy Games
attributes.caption: Welcome to the Rooster Corps -- a coalition of eleven spy agencies, allied in pursuit of world peace. But when one of the "little roosters" is duped into killing another, it's up to the survivors to root out an evil saboteur before they can acquire the ul
attributes.description: Welcome to the Rooster Corps -- a coalition of eleven spy agencies, allied in pursuit of world peace. But when one of the ""little roosters"" is duped into killing another, it's up to the survivors to root out an evil saboteur before they can acquire the ultimate super weapon -- and it's up to YOU to crack the case!    The successor to Rooster Teeth's Ten Little Roosters, The Eleven Little Roosters pits international assassins against each other in an original, interactive spy comedy. Sit back and enjoy a thriller with twists and turns... OR get in on the action, with mind-bending puzzles hidden in every episode that'll force you to rethink how you watch a web series. Search for clues, predict the targets, and win cool stuff!

attributes.title: Episode 2: Honor Among Assassins
attributes.caption: The killer mole has made their first move and will soon strike again, agents fortify their positions while one wrestles with their moral code.586

attributes.title: Episode 3: Recon Rebirth
attributes.caption: There's unrest amongst the Roosters as deals are made, alliances fracture and one agent transforms altogether. Who among them will the killer mole claim next?

attributes.title: Episode 4: The Most Dangerous Game
attributes.caption: One of the Roosters must choose between love of country and love of... love, as a large sporting match puts everyone in jeopardy.

attributes.title: Episode 5: Rogue Nation
attributes.caption: It's a scramble to stop a suspected Rooster from murdering an ally, but all may not be what it seems as the mole claims another victim.

attributes.title: Episode 6: Born Identities
attributes.caption: Secret identities and ulterior motives abound as the Rooster Corps falls to infighting -- and yet another Rooster is eliminated.

attributes.title: Episode 7: Double Triple Cross
attributes.caption: The survivors make a last-ditch attempt to dismantle the super weapon altogether, as the mole doubles their power with the help of a new ally -- and eliminates TWO agencies.

attributes.title: Episode 8: Mission Critical
attributes.caption: All bets are off as the mole's identity is revealed -- and their masterplan comes to fruition. But can the surviving Roosters prevail without someone dying? Probably not.
